    pastclim overview

Documentation for the Krapp2021 dataset

Source: R/datasets_docs.R
Krapp2021.Rd

This dataset covers the last 800k years, at intervals of 1k years.

Details

This dataset can be downloaded with download_dataset. The files can be found at

Manica, Andrea (2022): pastclim_krapp2021_v1.0.0. figshare. Dataset. https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.19733680.v1

based on

Krapp, M., Beyer, R.M., Edmundson, S.L. et al. A statistics-based reconstruction of high-resolution global terrestrial climate for the last 800,000 years. Sci Data 8, 228 (2021). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-021-01009-3

The version included in `pastclim` has the icesheets masked.

Note that, for bio15, we use the corrected version, which follows https://pubs.usgs.gov/ds/691/ds691.pdf

Developed by Michela Leonardi, Andrea Manica.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.4.
